p: STZ was procured from Sigma-Aldrich Co. (St. Louis, MO, USA). Acarbose was purchased from Glenmark Pharmaceuticals Ltd. (Watford, UK). Auto-analyser glucometers were obtained from Infopia Co., Ltd. (Gyeonggi, Korea). All reagents were of analytical grade and water was glass distilled. Natural honey was sourced from the bee farm of the Department of Crop, Soil, and Pest management, Federal University of Technology, Akure, Nigeria. Standardized natural cocoa powder (non-alkalized) was purchased from Oba market, Akure, Nigeria.
